=================================================
Documentation for aaa_vehicle_operating_costs.csv
=================================================
Data in this file is used in the CalculateVehicleOwnCost module to compute a rough cost of vehicle operating cost to use along with vehicle ownership cost in the analysis of whether households will drop one or more cars for their inventory because it would be less expensive to use a car service.

File Structure
--------------
Rows contain data for cost categories.
Column names as follows:
Category: operating cost categories which include the following
    Fuel: cost of fuel including fuel taxes
    Maintenance/Repair/Tires: cost of routine maintenance, repairs and tires
SmallSedan: cost in cents per mile for small sedans 
MediumSedan: cost in cents per mile for medium sedans 
LargeSedan: cost in cents per mile for large sedans 
SmallSUV: cost in cents per mile for small sport utility vehicles
MediumSUV: cost in cents per mile for medium sport utility vehicles
Minivan: cost in cents per mile for minivans
Pickup: cost in cents per mile for pickup trucks

Notes:
Costs are averages for vehicles that are purchased new and owned for 5 years.

Source:
-------
Your Driving Costs: How much are you really paying to drive, American Automobile Association, 2017. Accessed from:
http://exchange.aaa.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/17-0013_Your-Driving-Costs-Brochure-2017-FNL-CX-1.pdf
